description: Colin Chapman's philosophy distilled to its purest form: simplify, then add lightness. At under 2000 pounds, the Elise doesn't need big power â€” its Toyota-sourced 1.8 liter four feels like twice its output when you're carrying half the weight of everything else on the road.
lore: Driving an Elise through Nova Pacifica's canyon roads is a religious experience. You feel every pebble, every crack, every degree of camber through the unassisted steering. It's not fast in a straight line. It doesn't need to be. Nothing catches it in the corners.
